name: Lost Inside (mshoshan)
description:
Play as Roe, a young child determined to collect pieces of their prized toy, Mr. Fluffy Muffins, from the horrid depths of a decaying behemoth. Roe must subject themselves to the terrors of the unknown as they traverse through rot and darkness to find what’s rightfully theirs. Something lurks in the shadows and it’s got an insatiable appetite. Use Roe’s flashlight to illuminate nearby surroundings, solve puzzles, and fend off unwanted company. Don’t depend on the torch for too long though, it’s battery life is fickle. Sometimes, hiding is the best option.

Team Producer: Nazely Hartoonian

AI and Systems Programmer: Mayan Shoshani

Gameplay and Level Designer: Peter Doria

Character and Environmental Artists: Jordyn LaRocca, Jonah Aydin, and Chloe Moon

Audio Designers: Chloe Moon and Nazely Hartoonian

Most audio retrieved from Freesound.org
